LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.label: Arachnae Nutrient Supply Tower
LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.description: A central nutrient supply facility. It automatically refuels connected buildings that require nutrients. The tower itself must be manually filled with a large amount of biomass.
LanguageData.ARA_CarapaceProduction.label: Arachnae Chitin Synthesis Pit
LanguageData.ARA_CarapaceProduction.description: A structure used for chitin synthesis. The Arachnae swarm converts excess raw resources into **chitin plates** and stores them. These plates are a versatile material essential for the swarm's equipment and structures.
